The skills table located on the `Project -> Subject` page offers a number of optional `Additional Columns`:
![image.png](data:image/png;base64,)
To enable a column simply select one of the options and the new column will appear in the table. Additional Columns include:

* **Points** \- shows total points for the skill with a breakdown of `Point Increment x Occurrences to Completion`
* **Self Report** \- whether self reporting is enabled and if so the type of `Approval Queue` or `Honor System`
* **Catalog** \- whether this skill was imported from the Skills Catalog or exported to the Skills Catalog
* **Time Window -** show whether Time Window is configured
* **Version** \- version is shown if utilized
